org.hibernate.tool.schema.extract.spi

Class DatabaseInformationBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hibernate.tool.schema.extract.spi.DatabaseInformationBuilder

  • public class DatabaseInformationBuilder
extends Object
    Acts as the entry point into building DatabaseInformation instances. The correlation is 1-to-1 between DatabaseInformationBuilder and DatabaseInformation, meaning a given DatabaseInformationBuilder should only be used to build a single DatabaseInformation instance.
